section.title: Translations Preferences
section.p: The source plugin project translation-ui, under the package com.odcgroup.translation.ui.preferences contains classes and resources related to translations preferences.
The preferences allows a user of DS to define both the default language and the additional languages.

section.title: Extension Points
section.p: The extension point "org.eclipse.ui.propertyPages" is used to defined the property page to view and edit the translations preferences of each OFS project separately.
This extension point is declared in project translation-ui
